definition: to draw designs, maps etc/picture (e.g. of life in the city)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The elephants paint pictures in Elephant Show at Nongnooch Tropical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 泰国芭达雅东芭乐园的大象表演画图。

sentences.english: Initially, we could only animate with GIF image files.
sentences.chinese: 起初，我们只能用GIF动画图片。

sentences.english: To draw pictures, we must first load some picture functions, which are part of a library for creating slide presentations.
sentences.chinese: 我们先要加载一些能生成图片的函数库才能开始画图。

sentences.english: Drawing sketches is the basic drill of future engineers.
sentences.chinese: 画图纸是这些准工程师的基础功。

sentences.english: Plane geometry exam, one problem is drawing, I'm not accurate.
sentences.chinese: 平面几何考试，有一道题是画图，我画得不够精确。

sentences.english: Alpoy – an online tool that can make avatar and animate picture for you.
sentences.chinese: 一个在线工具，可为你制作头像和动画图片。

sentences.english: GetAccelerationMask Get a mask of drawing functions that are hardware accelerated with the current settings.
sentences.chinese: 获得画图函数的一个掩码，即是当前设置被硬件加速。

sentences.english: They marked all of their charts and made all their calculations on loose-leaf paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们自己在活页纸上画图，计算。

sentences.english: China is so vast that whatever you report is an incomplete picture.
sentences.chinese: 中国如此辽阔，我们的报告终归是一幅不全面的画图。

sentences.english: The student described a circle with a pare of compasses.
The drawing paper is neatly squared off.
sentences.chinese: 画图纸被整齐地划成方格。

sentences.english: Would you ask Picasso to play Pictionary?
sentences.chinese: 会让毕加索去玩画图猜词游戏吗？

sentences.english: I'm not the most gifted at drawing on the computer.
Yeah, I could make pictures with my phone cards by putting them together.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我可在我的电话卡上画图把它们放在一起。

sentences.english: I draw a picture with markers.
The colors and picture drawing are the creative side, the note taking is the analytical side.
sentences.chinese: 色彩和画图是创意的一半，做笔记则是分析的一半。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
to make a draft/to draft (a document)
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
descriptive geometry (three-dimensional geometry using projections and elevations)
